overview: An ambitious young man, with a na√Øve mother and a philandering father, returns home from college to discover that the girl next door has grown up in a very enticing and exciting way! As sexy and gorgeous as she is, he can't get her beautiful mother, who gave him one hot and seductive kiss before he left for college, out of his mind. Featuring Dana DeArmond, Chloe Foster and Cameron D!
title: My Girlfriend's Mother 7
